definition: variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]
difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]

sentences.english: Do not forget to keep the subject within the parallax correction mark.
sentences.chinese: 别忘了让被摄主体保持在视差纠正线之内。

sentences.english: The zero parallax setting (ZPS) is also important to the experience.
sentences.chinese: 保证零视差的设备的设置也非常重要。

sentences.english: The zero parallax setting is also important to the experience.
sentences.chinese: 保证零视差的设备的设置也非常重要。

sentences.english: The concept of parallax measurements of the stars is simple.
sentences.chinese: 视差测量恒星的概念很简单。

sentences.english: Instead we use a technique called "parallax.
sentences.chinese: 相反我们用一种技术叫“视差”。

sentences.english: The invention provides a technique for eliminating vertical parallax of multi-viewpoint stereo image.
sentences.chinese: 本发明提出一种消除多视点立体图像垂直视差的技术。

sentences.english: The parallax barrier is tuned to the horizontal separation between the human eyes.
sentences.chinese: 视差屏障被调节为可在平行方向区别人的两个眼睛。

sentences.english: Based on stereo disparity, a vision system for locating three-dimensional position is described in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 描述了基于双眼视差原理的三维空间定位系统。

sentences.english: An approach based on disparity space to a binocular visual odometry system is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种基于视差空间的双目视觉里程计算法。

sentences.english: The time-parallax is a method of close-range photogrammetry.
sentences.chinese: 时间视差法是近景摄影测量中的一种方法。

sentences.english: Project with example of how to use the parallax.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个如何使用视差动效的示例。
